message: Let's be fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a small share to start.  We can adjust in later rounds if you're unhappy.
My turn for a proposal, Alice. Let's be realistic and acknowledge the time pressure. This offer accounts for inflation and gives us both a good deal.
We're both losing money each round. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up some of my share to avoid further losses.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The clock is ticking and we're both losing out. I'm offering you a very reasonable 450,000 - take it before inflation eats away at it even further!
